items.name: util-date-time
items.description: Utilities for working with Date and time.
items.title: Date Time

items.name: util-db-mock
items.description: Simple in memory sync db, for mock or playground only. Do not use in production.
items.title: DB Mock

items.name: util-emojy-generator
items.description: Simple generator of random emoji, that do not generator emoji previously used.
items.title: Emoji Generator

items.name: util-execution-timer
items.description: Utility for calculating the time taken to execute a piece of code.
items.title: Execution Timer

items.name: util-math
items.description: Math utilities like lerp, clamp, etc.
items.title: Math

items.name: util-object
items.description: Utilities for working with objects, like pick and omit.
items.title: Object

items.name: util-try-catch-async
items.description: Utility for handling async functions, and forcing you to handle error cases.
items.title: Try Catch Async

items.name: util-ts-result-zod
items.description: Result pattern with Zod instead of Typescript Types a source.
items.title: Ts Result Zod

items.name: util-infer-deploy-url
items.description: Utilities for inferring deploy url from auto-injected env vars on platform like Vercel or Netlify.
items.title: Infer Deploy Url
